观察；侦查；查看；<非正式>（盗抢前）踩点儿；探察；检查；打量；装箱；把…装入箱（或盒、套等）内；把…放入容器中；（用材料、物质）围绕；包盖

n. 时刻；场合；理由；原因；仪式；庆典；重大场合；适当时机

word_mean_info__list.difference: 可与sample换用，但常指人或物中选出的有代表性部分，或指供科研、化验或检验用的标本。
指用来说明、解释某种理论或看法而引用的例证。
多指需要加以认真研究的实例，如病例，案例等。
普通用词，指能代表同类事物性质或一般规律的典型例子。
多指用于说明、支持或反证一般事实或理论的事例。

word_group.brief_definition: 既然那样, 假使那样的话
无论如何, 不管怎样
在这个案例；在本案中；在此案例中
大多数情况下；大多数情况中
个案研究, 案例研究
根据具体情况, 视情况而定
(为日后行窃)踩点, 踩道, 探路
处理事件(尤指刑事侦查)
在任何情况下决不；无论如何都不

bilingual.source: Once regarded as a hopeless case by all, Uncle Jules was now considered a good and honest man.
bilingual.target: 曾被大家认为是无可救药的案例，朱尔斯叔叔现在被认为是一个好人和诚实的人。
法官正在审理这个案例。

bilingual.source: This case helped us understand the problem.
bilingual.target: 这个案例帮助我们理解了问题。

bilingual.source: We can learn a lot through case analysis.
bilingual.target: 通过案例分析，我们可以学到很多。

bilingual.source: She presented her case analysis at the meeting.
bilingual.target: 她在会议上展示了她的案例分析。

bilingual.source: The movie depicted a classic case of entrapment.
bilingual.target: 电影描绘了一个经典的诱捕案例。

bilingual.source: Their case analysis is very detailed and useful.
bilingual.target: 他们的案例分析非常详细和有用。

bilingual.source: They will present their case to the board of directors.
bilingual.target: 他们将向董事会提出他们的案例。

bilingual.source: The paralegal conducted research on relevant case laws.
bilingual.target: 律师助理进行了相关案例法的研究。

list.abstract: case：英语单词，做名词、及物动词，相关短语有:in case 以防；免得in any case无论如何,总之等。
CASE是口袋折刀品牌，也是美国刀具质量的代名词。 它在刀具业当中是一令人尊重的质量精神象征，在其知识性及敬仰度的基石下再加上众人口耳相传，市场不断扩大。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, that's fascinating and ripe for a psychiatrist's case study somewhere, but, I am looking for Serena.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对精神病医师来说真是个吸引力又成熟的案例，我在找瑟琳娜。

yingyinNormal.en: Now let's discuss a special case. The only living being that uses its brain better than us; the dolphin.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在探讨一个特殊案例，唯一运用大脑比我们更厉害的生物，就是海豚。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, let's see, excitable, emotional, prone to fantasy. Textbook case of female hysteria. Untreatable, some say. I beg to differ.
yingyinNormal.zh: 易激动，情绪化，老是幻想，女性歇斯底里典型案例，有人说没得救，我倒不同意。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《爱丽丝梦游仙境2：镜中奇遇记》

yingyinNormal.en: Postponed 30 days. Next case.
yingyinNormal.zh: 推迟30天，下个案子。

yingyinNormal.en: What will you do in that case?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这种情况之下，你会怎么做呢?

yingyinNormal.en: In this case, opposites attract.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在这种情形下，异性就会相吸。

yingyinNormal.en: Chandler, Heckles was a nut case.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哈克是个神经病。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, in that case, it was pretty good.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果是这样，那就变得"超美味"呢。

yingyinNormal.en: Rach. Go get back on that case, honey.
yingyinNormal.zh: 瑞秋。你别管这件事。

yingyinNormal.en: In which case, all glory to the hive queen.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那种情况下，一切荣耀皆奉献给母皇。

yingyinNormal.en: CASE, you're with me. Anyone else can stay.
yingyinNormal.zh: CAS，你跟我走，别人都可以留下。

yingyinNormal.en: In which case, I can start at the beginning.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你觉得混淆的话，我也可以从第一部分讲起。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm just saying, get his number, just in case.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我建议你去问他的电话号码，以防万一。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, actually... Don't. He's making our case.
yingyinNormal.zh: 其实...闭嘴，他在为我们说话呢。

yingyinNormal.en: Here. In case you need something to write with.
yingyinNormal.zh: 给你，如果你需要支笔写字。

yingyinNormal.en: I rest my case. I'm sorry, daddy. I'm sorry, too.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的陈述终止。对不起，大爸。我也该说对不起。

yingyinNormal.en: John's working a case. A homicide? Let's hope not.
yingyinNormal.zh: 约翰正在调查一个案子。凶杀案？但愿不是。

yingyinNormal.en: But how were our seats? Excellent. I rest my case.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但我俩的座位如何？相当好。那不就结了。

yingyinNormal.en: Or in this case, the bar mitzvah boy with pinkeye.
yingyinNormal.zh: 或者就像是得了红眼病的犹太小男孩。

yingyinNormal.en: You wouldn't dare. You will make the case for evil.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你敢。你是“恶”方辩手。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 小瀑布；连续传递过程；瀑布状下垂物；大量涌现的东西；接踵而至的东西；连续阶段；一系列装置

word_family.mean: n. 情形；事例；实例；病例；伤例；个案例；诉讼案；格；盒；套；壳；罩；容器

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 在这种情况下；既然这样

sense_info_list.en: an instance of a particular situation; an example of something occurring

examination_example.sentence: In both <highlight>cases</highlight>, we need a rebalancing of power.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这两种情况下，我们都需要重新平衡权力。

examination_example.sentence: But privacy is not the only angle in this <highlight>case</highlight> and not even the most important.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但在这种情况下，隐私不是唯一的角度，甚至不是最重要的。

examination_example.sentence: The Spanish <highlight>case</highlight> provides arguments both for and against monarchy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 西班牙的例提供了支持和反对君主制的论据。

sense_info_list.zh: 案件; 官司; 诉讼

examination_example.sentence: Whereas prosecutors should only evaluate a <highlight>case</highlight> based on its merits.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 而检察官只能根据案情对案件进行评估。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>case</highlight> may yet reach the Supreme Court.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 此案可能会提交最高法院。

examination_example.sentence: In October the Department of Justice filed a brief in the Myriad <highlight>case</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 今年10月，司法部就Myriad案提交了一份简报。

sense_info_list.en: a set of facts or arguments supporting one side of a debate or controversy
sense_info_list.zh: 论据; 理由; 事实

examination_example.sentence: There is a strong <highlight>case</highlight> that those who have been worst affected by industrial action should receive compensation for the disruption they have suffered.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个强有力的理由是，那些受到工业行动影响最严重的人应该为他们所遭受的破坏获得赔偿。

sense_info_list.en: surround in a material or substance
whatever happens or may have happened
sense_info_list.zh: (in any case)无论如何; 不管怎样

examination_example.sentence: It might be poetic, philosophical, sensual, or mathematical, but in any <highlight>case</highlight> it must, have something to do with the soul of the human being.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它可能是诗意的、哲学的、感官的或数学的，但无论如何，它必须与人类的灵魂有关。

sense_info_list.en: a container or covering used to protect or store things
sense_info_list.zh: 箱; 盒; 套; 罩

examination_example.sentence: She is proud that several sculptures have even gone on display again, albeit sometimes beneath protective <highlight>cases</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她感到自豪的是，一些雕塑甚至再次展出，尽管有时是在保护壳下。

sense_info_list.en: an instance of a disease or problem
sense_info_list.zh: 病例; 伤员; 问题

sense_info_list.en: the form of a noun, an adjective or a pronoun in some languages, that shows its relationship to another word

sample.mean: adj. 轻松的；漠不关心的；不定期的；非永久的；偶然的；意外的；非正式的；便服的；散漫的
n. 时刻；场合；理由；原因；仪式；庆典；重大场合；适当时机

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 表示"降临, 降落, 发生"

word_usage.usage:
in case可以用作连词，引导目的状语从句时表示“以免；以防”。
例：I’ll take my raincoat in case it rains. 我将带上雨衣，以防下雨。

in case作连词引导条件状语从句时，表示“万一；如果”。
例：Tell me in case you get into difficulty. 遇到困难请告诉我。

in case可以作副词，意思是“以防万一”
例：You’d better carry some money in case. 你最好带些钱，以防万一。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 录音磁带盒；盒式录音磁带；盒式录像带；胶卷盒；录像带盒；盒式胶卷

word_family.mean: n. 情形；事例；实例；病例；伤例；个案例；诉讼案；格；盒；套；壳；罩；容器

sense_info_list.en: a particular situation or a situation of a particular type

examination_example.sentence: In this <highlight>case</highlight>, selecting clothes can set you on the path to then achieving your goals.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这种情况下，选择衣服可以让你走上实现目标的道路。

examination_example.sentence: In the majority of <highlight>cases</highlight> we would be better off identifying people by the factors, like income.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在大多数情况下，我们最好通过收入等因素来识别人们。

examination_example.sentence: The Cascadia Rising drill gives area residents and emergency responders a chance to practice what to do in <highlight>case</highlight> of a 9.0-magnitude earthquake.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 卡斯卡迪亚地区上升演习使该地区的居民和紧急救援人员有机会练习9.0级地震时的处理方法。

sense_info_list.en: an example of something occurring; an instance of a disease or problem
sense_info_list.zh: 案例; 事例; 病例

examination_example.sentence: She stated she had heard rumors of stock burning but not specific <highlight>cases</highlight> until this week.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她说，她听到过烧毁库存的传言，但直到本周才知道具体的案例。

examination_example.sentence: By bracketing out different <highlight>cases</highlight> it became clear that the real-world socialite component correlated with greater wellbeing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但通过把不同的案例分开来看，很明显，现实世界中的社交名流与更大的幸福感相关。

examination_example.sentence: In this globalized age, there is a good <highlight>case</highlight> for international travel.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这个全球化的时代，国际旅行有一个很好的例子。

sense_info_list.en: a legal action, especially one to be decided in a court of law
a container designed to hold or protect something
sense_info_list.zh: 箱; 盒; 容器; 打包; 包裹

examination_example.sentence: His team used a new measuring approach that involved finding any surviving remnants, of the <highlight>casing</highlight> to determine where the original edge was.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的团队使用了一种新的测量方法: 通过查找套管中任何尚存的残余物，以确定原始边缘的位置。

sense_info_list.en: a person requiring or receiving medical or welfare attention

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 情形；事例；实例；病例；伤例；个案例；诉讼案；格；盒；套；壳；罩；容器

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 既然那样；假使那样的话
大多数情况下；大多数情况中

sense_info_list.en: a particular situation or a situation of a particular type

examination_example.sentence: In all <highlight>cases</highlight> prevention is better than cure.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在任何情况下，预防都胜于治疗。

examination_example.sentence: In the rare <highlight>cases</highlight> we have seen bad behavior, we have taken strong action in response, including banning a customer from the store.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在我们看到不良行为的罕见情况下，我们采取了强有力的行动作为回应，包括禁止一名顾客进入商店。

examination_example.sentence: So is five seconds on the floor the critical threshold (门槛) that separates a piece of eatable food from a <highlight>case</highlight> of food poisoning?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在地板上放置5秒钟是将可食用食物与会中毒食物区分开的关键门槛吗？

sense_info_list.en: an example of something occurring; an instance of a disease or problem
sense_info_list.zh: 案例; 事例; 病例

examination_example.sentence: Children were responsible for the vast majority of <highlight>cases</highlight>—95% of objects removed from noses and 85% from ears.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 绝大多数病例是儿童造成的——95%的物体从鼻子中取出，85%的物体从耳朵中取出。

examination_example.sentence: In a considerable percentage of <highlight>cases</highlight> of debt-induced financial stress, credit cards and loans will be a central element.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在相当大比例的债务引发的金融压力案例中，信用卡和贷款将是一个核心要素。

examination_example.sentence: In a 2011 USPS <highlight>case</highlight> study, the agency emphasized its massive infrastructure as a "unique federal asset" to be called upon in a disaster or terrorist attack.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在2011年美国邮政的一份案例研究中，该机构强调其庞大的基础设施是在灾难或恐怖袭击中需要调用的一份“独特的联邦资产。”

sense_info_list.en: a set of facts or arguments supporting one side of a debate or controversy
a legal action; especially one to be decided in a court of law

examination_example.sentence: It is bringing the <highlight>case</highlight> to the local district court.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它正把这个案子提交给当地的地方法院。

examination_example.sentence: Each Friday night a truck came, with <highlight>cases</highlight> of food that had to be unloaded, priced, and placed on shelves.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每周五晚上都会有一辆卡车来，装载着需要卸货、定价和上架的食品。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 录音磁带盒；盒式录音磁带；盒式录像带；胶卷盒；录像带盒；盒式胶卷

word_family.mean: n. 情形；事例；实例；病例；伤例；个案例；诉讼案；格；盒；套；壳；罩；容器

sense_info_list.zh: 事例; 事件; 情况

examination_example.sentence: In the former <highlight>case</highlight> you may be able to read a chapter.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在前一种情况下，你可以读一章。

examination_example.sentence: But in half the <highlight>cases</highlight> she wore a specially designed fat suit which increased her weight to 180 pounds.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但在一半的情况下，她都穿着特别设计的肥胖服，体重增加到180磅。

examination_example.sentence: The daily number of newly cured and discharged (出院) patients exceeded that of the newly confirmed <highlight>cases</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每日新增治愈出院人数超过新增确诊病例。

examination_example.sentence: It's a good idea to choose an alternative destination in <highlight>case</highlight> your first-choice tourist spot is not available.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 选择一个替代目的地是个好主意，以防你的首选旅游景点不可用。

examination_example.sentence: In <highlight>case</highlight> the clock in her room broke down.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 以防她房间的钟坏了。

examination_example.sentence: Larry told her that he had already put out the fire and she should not move in <highlight>case</highlight> she injured her neck.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 拉里告诉她，他已经把火扑灭了，她不要动，以免伤到脖子。

examination_example.sentence: To look into the <highlight>case</highlight>, Wang disguised (伪装) himself and joined the beggars.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了调查这件事，王乔装打扮，加入了乞丐的行列。

examination_example.sentence: O'Connor gave the deciding vote in many important <highlight>cases</highlight> during her 24 years on the top court.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在最高法院任职的24年里，奥康纳在许多重要案件中都投下了决定性的一票。

sense_info_list.zh: (in that case)既然那样; 假使那样的话

examination_example.sentence: But in that <highlight>case</highlight>, we will learn little the world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 既然那样，我们对这个世界了解甚少。

examination_example.sentence: 19 percent say they never use it while a further 13 percent keep it in <highlight>case</highlight> of emergencies.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 19%的人说他们从不使用固定电话，另有13%的人会留着固定电话以备不时之需。

examination_example.sentence: Some people believe that humorous complaints about the little problems of life make humor, and sometimes that is the <highlight>case</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有些人认为，对生活中的小问题幽默地抱怨会使人变得幽默，有时确实如此。

sample.mean: adj. 轻松的；漠不关心的；不定期的；非永久的；偶然的；意外的；非正式的；便服的；散漫的
n. 时刻；场合；理由；原因；仪式；庆典；重大场合；适当时机

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 表示"降临, 降落, 发生"

exam_freq_info.chinese: (in case of)假如发生; 万一

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 情形；事例；实例；病例；伤例；个案例；诉讼案；格；盒；套；壳；罩；容器

examination_example.sentence: In this <highlight>case</highlight>, you don't have enough time to go to both places.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这种情况下，你没有足够的时间去两个地方。

examination_example.sentence: Still, if this is the <highlight>case</highlight>, then why do so many people lie?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管如此，如果是这种情况的话，那么为什么会有这么多人撒谎呢？

examination_example.sentence: Perhaps it holds true for some <highlight>cases</highlight>, but often it does not.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 也许在某些情况下是正确的，但通常不是。

examination_example.sentence: An important <highlight>case</highlight> will be discussed at this meeting.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这次会议将讨论一个重要的案例。

examination_example.sentence: Of all the <highlight>cases</highlight>, 85% to 90% are Type 2 Diabetes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在所有病例中，85%至90%是二型糖尿病。

examination_example.sentence: That is to say, most <highlight>cases</highlight> of diabetes result from the unhealthy life style.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 也就是说，大多数糖尿病病例是由不健康的生活方式引起的。

examination_example.sentence: Handbags and pencil <highlight>cases</highlight>
examination_example.sentence_trans: 手提包和铅笔盒

examination_example.sentence: People can either wear them or use them to make things such as handbags and pencil <highlight>cases</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们可以穿上它们，也可以用它们来制作手袋和铅笔盒等物品。

examination_example.sentence: "Learning is brain change," says Professor James Zull from <highlight>Case</highlight> Western University in Cleveland, Ohio, USA.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “学习是大脑的改变，”美国俄亥俄州克利夫兰凯斯西储大学的詹姆斯·祖尔教授说。

sense_info_list.zh: (in case of)假如发生; 万一

examination_example.sentence: In <highlight>case</highlight> of fire, we should stay calm and leave as quickly as possible.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 万一发生火灾，我们应该保持冷静，尽快离开。

sample.mean: adj. 轻松的；漠不关心的；不定期的；非永久的；偶然的；意外的；非正式的；便服的；散漫的
n. 时刻；场合；理由；原因；仪式；庆典；重大场合；适当时机
